p: Endometriosis is characterized by fibrosis. A dense fibrous tissue induced by chronic inflammation surrounds the stroma and endometrial glands. Recent animal experiments pointed out that EGCG could prevent the fibrosis progression in endometriosis [ 92]. In vivo studies showed that the treatment with EGCG inhibited the proliferation, migration and invasion of endometriotic cells. Moreover, it inhibited TGF-β1-stimulated activation of MAPK and Smad signaling pathways and the expression of miRNA TGF-β1-dependent [ 92].
